post.body: *attention still focused like a stalker*
from now on all my attention is directed towards you. No beer can get me drunk enough to pull me away :))
Haha how did I miss this
really I don't remember when I was ever fun. Must have been my evil twin.
and out there it shall stay my love :))
I bet you would ;)
@firebug44 I'm not sure if I'm going.
nothing really just trying to get through the holidays you know
:) chicken and yellow rice from the cuban place by my house.
*slides plate over*
I'm still laughing at that one. Seriously, keep your hand on the mace when you walk to the car today.
lmfao exactyly what do you do for a living :))
oh the link was wrong but I found it. Looks like a good show. I don't think they play it here.
Me too, for making me wait he should have been more daring. Maybe a hot pink :P
He was just dying it his natural color (black)
*shaking my head at my BFF*
I'll be there in like 3 -4 hours let me just catch a flight
btw I missed you (hug)
OMG who's Derrick?
was that your bf running on the field lmao
pick me up a cornbeef on rye
@firebug44 you both have kids celebrating birthdays today,cool! Happy Birthday to everyone!
I'll text you later for details LOL ;)
you know it's true ;)
ohhh someone has a story they need to tell me
I'm the only one that matters
I'm still debating whether I should buy one and which one to buy.
@firebug44 weren't you guys supposed to share a room In vegas?
yeah it was bad. I thought you watched.
shhh girl you going to get me caught
the donor?
I'm a Dolphins fan but I like the Cowboys too
Here's to all my friends and enemies. Love you all. Cheers! - Photo: http://bkite.com/02YyD
This guy just did two cartwheels while wearing high heels with perfect execution. I wish I got a pic -
I have no idea what this stuff is but it's not bad. - Photo: http://bkite.com/02YnU
Holding water is very hard to do yet I can't help but to keep trying. -
Roller coasters are fun!!! YAY!!! -
Re-pinging @BeMeaningful: Have you read this: !0 Twitter Agendas http://tinyurl.com/5nrodj
Dinner time!! Who wants some? - Photo: http://bkite.com/02Vs4
Sometimes I wish real conversations were like twitter posts. It makes people get to the point faster.
My weekend has started. Let's get nekkid!!!!
It's funny how the people who always complain about me being quiet usually have nothing to say. -
One word: Friday, one more word: Morning! :) -
OMG the guy before me us getting his hair colored. Add another 15 min to my wait.
Waiting to get a haircut. God I'm bored :(
This is the longest day in all of the history of days.
The office lotto pool just went around. I should be a millionaire by this time Monday. Yay!!! -
I'm half asleep at work. Morning everyone!
Watching the Michael Jackson episode of South Park. The best ever. If you don't think so your just "ignorant" and "have do do in your...
I just knocked out a months worth of work in 3 days. Some give me my MVP award now. -
Morning brightkites and tweets! Have a great day and week! -
Joey Porter.
LOL why do I always attract the weird guy
I always rush to appointments and no one is ever on time. The day I'm late all hell is going to break loose I know it.
My co-worker is feed and now I'm hungry. Why didn't u buy myself something. That confirms it, I'm stupid.
Bringing lunch to a co-worker on my day off. Either I'm really nice or really stupid. I think it's a little of both. -
Watching Pee Wee's Big Adventure
Eating lunch after a great work out. http://twitpic.com/xndq
Just got my playoff ticket.
The first person I followed on Twitter was @firebug44. http://tinyurl.com/9cflat #firstfollow (Damn lady you get around :P)
